name: Classic Professional
description: A clean and traditional layout perfect for corporate and academic job applications.

name: Modern Minimalist
description: A sleek and minimal design that focuses on readability and clean structure.

name: Elegant Design
description: A stylish template with balanced use of color and typography for creative professionals.

name: Creative Edge
description: Perfect for designers or artists, this layout adds visual flair while staying professional.

name: Corporate Blue
description: A formal blue-accented template ideal for business, finance, or IT-related positions.

name: Simple Focus
description: Straightforward and distraction-free, designed to highlight your experience and skills.

name: Modern Blocks
description: A block-based structure for an organized and visually balanced presentation.

name: Stylish Gradient
description: A trendy resume with soft gradients and elegant typography for modern job seekers.

name: Smart Compact
description: Compact and smart layout that fits all key information in a single-page design.

name: Bold Impression
description: A bold and eye-catching design that helps you stand out in competitive fields.
